segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen, sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, polishing the plate diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs full tilt from the faucet, no stop in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin can't hold it; overflow hits the floor hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle expands, wetting her shoe and the cabinet bases.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She remains oblivious, lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Leftward, the cabinet doors swing open to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool stretches up, hand buried in cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles, legs akimboâ€”dangerous balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's using a plate to steady or catch falling treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaches toward him, eager for her portion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork in mischief is quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the window reveals a neat path lined with plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between inside chaos and outside order is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
